result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher S Lindner

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Christopher S Lindner
Current: M210 Mann Rd, Marshfield, WI 54449 United States  (Effective: 06-05-2015)
Prior: M210 Mann St, Marshfield, WI 54449

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 2:54 p.m. 
**Includes 14CF637, 14CM537 & 15CF4, 14TR5470**
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears in person with Attorney Damon Stichert.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief filed.
State files Amended Information in 14CF637. Reading waived. COURT accepts Amended Information. Attorney Stichert notes all motions filed by defense are withdrawn at this time. COURT grants withdrawal of motions. 
State moves to: 14CF637- Amended Ct.1- Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer to Ct.1- Failure to Obey Traffic Signal (reflected on amended information), DRI Ct.2- Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, DRI Ct.3- Operating While Revoked, DRI Ct.4- Bail Jumping (Misd) & DRI Ct. 5- Bail Jumping (Misd)
                            14CM537- Delete repeater enhancer on Ct.1- OWI 4th & DRI Ct.2- Operating While Revoked (Repeater)
                            15CF4- DRI Ct.1- Bail Jumping (Felony), DRI Ct. 2- Operating While Revoked & DRI Ct.3- Bail Jumping (Misd)
COURT GRANTS. 
PLEA: 14CF637- Ct.1- Failure to Obey Traffic Signal>>NO CONTEST
            14CM537- Ct.1- OWI 4th>>NO CONTEST 
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made: a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: 14CF637- Ct.1- 100 days MCJ with huber for childcare and treatment concurrent to 14CM537, CC & DNA surcharge.
                             14CM537- Ct.1- 100 days MCJ with huber for childcare and treatment to begin immediately and concurrent to 14CF637, $2,135.00 fine inclusive of CC, 27 month DL revocation with credit for time admin. suspended, any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 16 months; as is the defendant himself, AODA and follow up & 6 points on DL.
Defendant is entitled to 10 days credit on both files. 
COURT reopens 14TR5470 and dismisses. 
Adj: 3:14 p.m.

to Judge Falstad from Atty. Stichert
Includes 14CF637, 14CM537, 15CF4
org. warrant returned from Sheriff's dept
Defendant did not appear for initial appearance.
